org.eodisp.wrapper.hla
Class HLAEncodingOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          java.io.DataOutputStream
              org.eodisp.wrapper.hla.HLAEncodingOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable
public class HLAEncodingOutputStream
extends java.io.DataOutputStream

An output stream with methods for writing values using standard HLA encoding.

Author:
Andrzej Kapolka
